Bernard Sirius schrieb:
> 
> My next problem is that I'm supposed to find something at http://67.207.136.21:8080/admin/
> but that gives a 404 (try it!)
> 
> There must still be something wrong... Any idea?

Hi Bernard.

Try connecting directly to http://67.207.136.21:8080/. For me this
works. I can connect o your Web administrative Console from here. The
path of the Web Administrative Console has changed from Heritrix 1.X to
2.0.X, I think. That why you get an HTTP 404 Error when trying to
connect to http://67.207.136.21:8080/admin.

Hope this helps
Christian
